highlighted.title: Actualizando Ruby y Rails con Dual Booting
highlighted.description: Cómo usar la técnica de Dual Booting para actualizar Ruby, Rails, y cualquier otra gema.

upcoming.title: Introduction to Ruby on Rails
upcoming.description: Learn the basics of Ruby on Rails and build your first web application.

upcoming.title: Intermediate Ruby on Rails
upcoming.description: Dive deeper into Ruby on Rails and explore more advanced concepts and techniques.

upcoming.title: Deploying Ruby on Rails Apps
upcoming.description: Learn how to deploy your Ruby on Rails applications to production environments.

upcoming.title: Ruby on Rails Best Practices
upcoming.description: Discover best practices and techniques for building maintainable and scalable Ruby on Rails applications.

upcoming.title: Ruby on Rails and React Integration
upcoming.description: Learn how to integrate Ruby on Rails with React to build powerful and dynamic web applications.

upcoming.title: Ruby on Rails and GraphQL
upcoming.description: Explore how to use GraphQL with Ruby on Rails to build efficient and flexible APIs.
